remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果命中测试位置不在上, 则属性将为`null`。If the hit test location is not on a , the property will be `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要运行此示例, 请创建一个包含已命名`treeView1`的 Windows 窗体, 并使用多个级别的节点填充该窗体。To run this example, create a Windows Form that contains a named `treeView1`, and populate it with several levels of nodes. 将以下代码粘贴到窗体中, 并将的`treeView1`事件与`treeView1_MouseDown`方法相关联。Paste the following code into a form, and associate the event of `treeView1` with the `treeView1_MouseDown` method.
